name: Memorix
overview: A brain/memory game. Here is a puzzle unsuitable for those who have a photographic memory, but it could be used to develop everyone else's memory. In practice, it is a question of observing a screen with 25 sets of matching icons that appear uncovered for 10 seconds and then finding all the matches in the set time frame. Published in Italy as Memoteca in Special C64 n.5 (1991/1992).
